K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-1: sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha bi dza ya n'a ma dha ra n'i kalpa sa hi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-7: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:204b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-1: nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-2: de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-3: kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-5: gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-6: tshe ring bsgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-12: kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-13: aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba tree lo kya pra ti bi shishta ya buddh'a ya ta na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-16: sho dha ya sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-17: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-18: aa sa ma sa manta aa ba bh'a sa spha ra na ga ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205a-19: ga ga na sva bh'a wa bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-0: @205b aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-2: sarbba ta th'a ga ta: su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-3: aa mri ta aa bhi she kee ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-4: ma h'a mu dra mantra pa dee:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-5: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-6: ma ma a'a yu: sandha ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-7: sho dha ya sho dha ya; bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-8: ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-9: aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-10: sa ha sra rasmi sanytso di te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-11: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a aa wa lo ki ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-12: sha tp'a ra mi ta pa ri p'u ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-13: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a m'a te da sha bhu mi pra tishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-14: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hram da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-15: aa dhishtha na aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-18: badzra k'a ya sam ha ta na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-20: sarbba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-22: ma ma a'a yur bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-23: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-24: aa dhishtha na aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-27: bi mu ni bi mu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-34: bh'u ta ka ti; pa ri shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-39: bi dza ya bi dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-42: sph'a ra ya sph'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-43: sarba buddha aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-56: ma ma sha ri ram sarbba satva n'anytsa k'a ya pa ri shuddho rbhab tu; ma sa d'a sarbba ga ti pa ri shuddhishtsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-57: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a shtsa m'am sa m'a shv'a sa yantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-60: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-61: bi bo dha ya bi bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-62: mo tsa ya mo tsa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:205b-63: bi me tsa ya bi mo tsa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-2: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-3: sa mant'a mo tsa ya mo tsa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-4: sa manta rasmi pa ri shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-5: sarbba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishth'i te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-7: ma h'a mu dre ma h'a mu dra mantra pa dee: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-10: 'chi bdag chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-11: dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-13: blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-14: de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-18: de ltar mchog gi tshe 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-21: mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-22: nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-23: gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzungs bris te tsandan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba stong gi mchod pas mchod cing zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206a-24: nad las grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-0: 'dam @206b bu'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-1: yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten la bris la rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-2: rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-5: sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas mandal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-6: aa ga ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-7: de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la; de la g-yon pa'i lag pas reg ste g-yas pa'i lag pas phreng ba 'dzin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-8: nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-11: dgra yongs su nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-14: skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:206b-18: rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-0: srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung @207a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-2: nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-4: nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-5: de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon chen po'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-6: de dang der zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-7: so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-11: chu khyor ba gsum dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-12: nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-13: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-15: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-16: sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-17: 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-19: dri ba legs par smras pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-20: dpa' bo chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-21: sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207a-22: 'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de @207b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-6: aa mri ta g'a mi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-7: aa mri ta a'a yurda te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-8: ga ga na k'irti ka re sarbba kle sha ksha yam ka ri ye sv'ah'a zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-9: byug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-10: gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-12: mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-13: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-17: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad padma'i steng na bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-18: de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-21: dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-22: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-23: g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-24: rdo rje 'chang gnyis rda yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-25: de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g-yas bskor gyi sbyor bas padma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:207b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-0: de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chu @208a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-1: gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa chen po byas te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong brag gcig bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-3: zla ba re re zhing byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-4: zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-5: rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-8: tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-9: gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-10: lha ma yin dang bcas mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug gtor mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-11: de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-12: rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-13: stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga'am gcig gi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-14: nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-15: ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-16: nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-17: sems can rnams la bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208a-18: brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-0: zla ba gzhan re re la mchod @208b pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-1: rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-3: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-6: tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-8: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-10: dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-11: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-12: rna ba'i pu gar dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-13: 'bras bu smin pa lta ga la 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-14: 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yangs grub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-16: gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-17: nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-18: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la tshad dang ldan pa'i mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-19: de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-20: tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-21: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:208b-22: ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-5: g-yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-7: mche bas ma mchu mnan ba mi bzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-8: autpa la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-10: sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-11: g-yas pa'i phyag gis snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-12: de bzhin du padma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-15: g-yon sngags mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-19: yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i aom dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-24: rkang pa gnyis la aam aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-25: yi ge 'di rnams bkod la raksha sv'ah'a dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming spel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-26: de'i logs gnyis su padma dang rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o; ;steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-27: logs bzhin khro bo mi g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-30: stobs po che zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209a-35: g-yon pa gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub ched du byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-0: @209b de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o; ;de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste ji srid bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-1: de nas spa bar nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-2: de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-4: thang ga de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-5: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te nyi ma re re zhing brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-6: yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa byas shing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-7: tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-8: stobs dpag tu med pas gzhan gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-10: nad chen po med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-11: sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re zhing tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i byin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-12: yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-13: des rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-14: ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-15: nyi ma re re la dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:209b-18: shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-4: yang na rang gis ma nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-5: de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang blo rno bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-6: de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-7: khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-8: tsandan dkar po'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram ste logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-9: phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar po g-yogs la yal gas kha brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-10: 'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la me lha bkug la dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-11: de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-12: yang na aom aa mri ta a'a yurda de sv'ah'a zhes bya bas tshe dang ldan dang blo rno ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210a-13: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-0: yang na zla ba re re'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes @210b brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-1: mchog gi tshe ring ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-2: blo rno ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-3: sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-4: cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing lo brgya lnga bcu 'tsho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-5: dgra las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-8: gal te rang gis ma nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-9: de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-10: de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-11: gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas pas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-12: tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-15: de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-19: 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-21: padma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-22: bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:210b-23: yang na ral gri la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-0: ring bsrel bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du thang sku bkram la stong @211a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-1: gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-3: yang na lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyis ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te lag pa g-yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-5: stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-6: sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-9: rtse gsum la sogs pa yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-10: de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-12: mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-13: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211a-14: de skyid pa 'thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-0: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te bde ba can @211b gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-1: bmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-2: 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-3: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-5: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-9: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-020:211b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
